rules.description: right_command + home row = numbers row, right_command + qwerty row = shift + number row, right_command + num row = F* row
right_command + m/,/.// = [/]/-/= (move braces and - and = to right lower row)
right_command + space = space (ignore right_command to avoid roll over effect)
CAPS_LOCK to CTRL or ESCAPE (If Alone)
TAB to shift+option+control (Amethyst mod2) or TAB (If Alone)
left command as tmux prefix (ctrl + A) when alone
HHKB del is pipe and back slash
HHKB left control to esc when alone
